description: Eluned Morgan will answer questions from you live on the BBC Radio Wales phone-in.
title: First minister Eluned Morgan takes questions on BBC Radio Wales
title_page: First minister Eluned Morgan takes questions on BBC Radio Wales - BBC News
maintext:
Tap play button above to watch Eluned Morgan answer your questions
Hello, we're bringing you live footage as First Minister Eluned Morgan answers listeners' questions live on BBC Radio Wales.
